item.title: decompling dotnet assemblies
item.description: I used dotpeek for a while to decompile dotnet assembly. Only yesterday I finally found a way to export project from dotnet assembly. The picture below is the menu to do that in dotpeek. However the version I used doesnâ€™t perfectly decompile lambda expression. The decompiled code of lambda expressions are very hard to understand. Ilspy is one of decompiler that can decompile lambda in a understandble way.
